name: 張詠翔
objective: The course provides an introduction to English phonetics. We will focus on the articulatory aspect of English vowels and consonants and learn to transcribe these speech sounds in IPA (International Phonetic Alphabet). The course will also cover the general patterns of stress and intonation in English. At the end of this course, students will be able to identify their own pronunciation problems and apply this practical experience to English pronunciation teaching.
schedule: A detailed syllabus will be distributed on the first day of class.
